channel.title: Help Me!
channel.description: I was botting on RS2 for a while ages ago, and they caught me and banned me. Now they have given me a chance to re-appeal it, but I don't know what to say because they caught me autoing. Please help me!

item.title: Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

You should use this as an opportunity to go outside for once.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:8, topic:347384”]Hi my name is james and i like love runescape and jagex, i want my acocunt back and i love it, i didnt read rules because i am dyslexic and find it diffucult to read and write hard stuff. my tutor did tell me yesterday about the rules, i now know them and see that the program i bought online is bad and deleted from my pc.

thanks[/quote]
Most dyslexic people are much worse than that in writing, so I don’t think they would see you faking.

Read full topic

item.description:
@SETO wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:13, topic:347384”][quote author=Original Daniel link=topic=443757.msg3259856#msg3259856 date=1278409002]
they just call the cops iirc
[/quote]I tried it once, didn’t happen.[/quote]

happen to my mate…came on the door knocking asking for his username

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

[quote=“jamesn, post:3, topic:347384”][quote]Dear Jagex team,

I am sincerely sorry about the offenses I have made over Runescape. I did not read the rules correctly, but now I have. It has been 7 long months, and I would like to apologise for my actions of breaking rules in the game.

I would like to let you know that I have changed since the past 7 months, and now am a more responsible, nice young man and I have read your rules to the game so It will prevent me in breaking any rules.

If you would please consider this letter of apology as It would no longer happen again, I would be grateful to kindly play Runescape again without hassles.[/quote]

Good enough? I was banned for autoing.[/quote]

I cant believe that after a break of 7 months you STILL want to play?

Read full topic

Dear JaGEx,
Since you banned me I have become extremely depressed. If I do not get unbanned I will kill myself.
Please, save me.
[/quote]

item.title: Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @g-stringer g-stringer
item.description:
@g-stringer wrote:

[quote=“jamesn, post:3, topic:347384”][quote]Dear Jagex team,

I am sincerely sorry about the offenses I have made over Runescape. I did not read the rules correctly, but now I have. It has been 7 long months, and I would like to apologise for my actions of breaking rules in the game.

I would like to let you know that I have changed since the past 7 months, and now am a more responsible, nice young man and I have read your rules to the game so It will prevent me in breaking any rules.

If you would please consider this letter of apology as It would no longer happen again, I would be grateful to kindly play Runescape again without hassles.[/quote]

Good enough? I was banned for autoing.[/quote]

item.title: Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @jamesn jamesn
item.description:
@jamesn wrote:

Dear Jagex team,

I am sincerely sorry about the offenses I have made over Runescape. I did not read the rules correctly, but now I have. It has been 7 long months, and I would like to apologise for my actions of breaking rules in the game.

I would like to let you know that I have changed since the past 7 months, and now am a more responsible, nice young man and I have read your rules to the game so It will prevent me in breaking any rules.

If you would please consider this letter of apology as It would no longer happen again, I would be grateful to kindly play Runescape again without hassles.

Good enough? I was banned for autoing.

Read full topic
